body.query: query SearchCandidates($candidateId: Id, $birthDate: BirthDate, $name: String, $limit: Int, $offset: Int) { candidate(candidateId: $candidateId, birthDate: $birthDate, name: $name, limit: $limit, offset: $offset) { id name firstName secondName middleName academicTitle salutation email birthDate phone functions address createdAt updatedAt contactHistory { title type date } } }
